thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com
thread.title: Bradley Hemmings

author: Bradley Hemmings
title: Bradley Hemmings
text:
Hi this is my review of Endoca's Hemp Oil, I first started using CBD Capsules from a friend who lives in cali he shipped them over to the UK for me which is legal as it is legal in the UK.
I would take 20mg in the morning about a hour before food and within 30 minutes I would feel relaxed like a slight pressure from my head and body just went away for most of the day. After around the 8+ hour mark of taking these I would feel really tired and bored so that is why I got the 300mg Hemp Oil from Endoca.
Before I go into detail about there Oil I would like to explain I use CBD for mild anxiety, slight depression, sleep problems and moods.
And I have got to say CBD is the cure to all of these any many more problems out there.
So back to Endoca's Hemp Oil, I have started taking 5 drops of a morning with my capsules and no more throughout the day unless I feel anxious or anything, but now I also use another 5 drops of a night when the capsules wear of so when I go to sleep I still feel relaxed and at peace and will drift of to sleep easily.
So overall I would recommend this Oil to everyone, even if you don't have any physical or mental problems it can still make you feel very healthy on a daily basis.
